name: Weapon Master (Dullame)
description:
Defeating enemy will get a random weapon and use it to defeat more enemies.

The number of four dices gives your attack cost, the half of sum of them is your walk cost. Click dice you want to use before you attack, click it again can cancel selected. 

WASD—— if walk cost (Upper right corner) >= player weight, then player moves

Arrows——adjust the direction of weapon

Spacebar——if selected cost >= cost (Upper left corner), then player attacks
